fixes.name: Change Initial Cash USD (excl Int/FWD)
fixes.dax_expression: 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)] - 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)]
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau subtraction to DAX by converting each column reference to the table-qualified format 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column]. The expression performs a direct subtraction between the two calculated fields.
fixes.type_changed_reason: One or more dependent calculated fields reference [Parameters], and any calculation that depends on parameters must be created as a measure.
